scripts.startProd: export NODE_ENV=production && export PORT=8080 && forever -o /var/log/node/console.log -e /var/log/node/error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.restartProd: forever stopall && export NODE_ENV=production && export PORT=8080 && forever -o /var/log/node/console.log -e /var/log/node/error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.startProdCmd: set NODE_ENV=production && set PORT=8080 && forever -a -l /logfile.log  -o /console.log -e /error.log start ./bin/www
